title: Introducing Unsong
summary:
Key ideas:
- There were many bizarre occurrences and omens in the year 1968.
- On December 24, 1968, the crew of Apollo 8 read the Book of Genesis while orbiting the moon.
- The year 1968 was a time of shattered dreams.

Key learnings:
- The broadcast of the Apollo 8 mission provided a brief moment of hope during a difficult year.
- Religious beliefs can provide a source of comfort and inspiration during difficult times.

Key questions:
- How did the Apollo 8 mission impact public perception of space exploration?
- What role did religious faith play in the Apollo 8 mission and in society at the time?
- How did the tumultuous events of 1968 shape popular culture and society?
